summary: Blink-182 is an American rock band formed in 1992 in California. The band's current members are Mark Hoppus, Tom DeLonge, and Travis Barker. They are known for their pop-punk music, blending catchy pop with fast punk rock. Their songs often talk about relationships and growing up. Blink-182 gained popularity for their energetic live shows and funny humor. They have released many albums, with big hits like "All the Small Things" and "Dammit." The band has had some lineup changes over the years, but they are still popular and have sold millions of albums worldwide.
title: Blink-182
